CKDApp Class Reference

#include <KDApp.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Usage: Inherit CKDApp in main CWinApp class
Warning:
You should use this class in static link for a better support
Other optional supports
Define the following keywords to enable
  • KDAPP_ENABLE_APPSELF_RESTART 
                #define KDAPP_ENABLE_APPSELF_RESTART
    Support for app-self restart
    add code in restart function: 
                theApp.SetRestart();
            // after close the application, it will start again
    See also:
    SetRestart() IsRestarted()
  • KDAPP_ENABLE_GETAPP_CONFDIR 
                #define KDAPP_ENABLE_GETAPP_CONFDIR
    Support for getting app config directory
    Remarks:
    It will create a directory, if it's not exists.
    See also:
    GetAppConfDir()
  • KDAPP_ENABLE_GETAPP_LANGDIR 
                #define KDAPP_ENABLE_GETAPP_LANGDIR
    Support for getting app language directory
    Remarks:
    It will create a directory, if it's not exists.
    See also:
    GetAppLangDir()
  • KDAPP_ENABLE_GETAPP_LOGDIR 
                #define KDAPP_ENABLE_GETAPP_LOGDIR
    Support for getting app log directory
    Remarks:
    It will create a directory, if it's not exists.
    See also:
    GetAppLogDir()
  • KDAPP_ENABLE_GETAPP_DLLDIR 
                #define KDAPP_ENABLE_GETAPP_DLLDIR
    Support for getting app dll directory
    Remarks:
    It will create a directory, if it's not exists.
    See also:
    GetAppDllDir()
  • KDAPP_ENABLE_UPDATEAPPONLINE 
                #define KDAPP_ENABLE_UPDATEAPPONLINE
    Todo:
    write document
  • KDAPP_ENABLE_GETAPPVERSION 
                #define KDAPP_ENABLE_GETAPPVERSION
    Support for getting app version
    See also:
    GetAppFileVer() GetAppProductVer()
  • KDAPP_ENABLE_SINGLEAPP 
                #define KDAPP_ENABLE_SINGLEAPP
    Support for getting other app running state
    add MACRO in InitInstance() of WinApp 
                    KDAPP_SINGLEAPP_CHECK_BEGIN;
                    // Some codes like the following line
                    AfxMessageBox(_T("Detected another ") APPNAME _T(" is running"));
                    return FALSE;
                KDAPP_SINGLEAPP_CHECK_END;
    add MACRO in DefWindowProc() of Main Dialog 
                    KDAPP_SINGLEAPP_REPLY_BEGIN;
                    // Some codes like the following line
                    ShowWindow(SW_SHOW);
                KDAPP_SINGLEAPP_REPLY_END;
    See also:
    IsWndRunning()
